fields.name: Rule 1
fields.value: Do not post anything that is in violation of EU and US laws, or the community guidelines of Discord(NSFW etc).

fields.name: Rule 2
fields.value: Do not post anything that is generally considered disturbing or inappropriate.

fields.name: Rule 3
fields.value: Be nice, treat others with respect and be polite, no toxic allowed.

fields.name: Rule 4
fields.value: No bullying. Jokes are okay, but don't take it too far and when someone says you should stop then stop.

fields.name: Rule 7
fields.value: Trying to get around bans by making more accounts is not allowed.

fields.name: Rule 8
fields.value: Moderators have the right to kick and ban people if they push the limits too far.

fields.name: Rule 9
fields.value: Follow the rules of the channel you are on.
